test.baseUrl: Run e2e tests against given url instead of auto-starting dev server
test.capabilities: Specify comma-delimited browser capabilities to run
test.config: Use your own WebdriverIO configuration (overrides plugin defaults)
test.debug: Enable Node inspector and debugging tools
test.details:
All WebdriverIO CLI options are supported.
http://webdriver.io/guide/testrunner/gettingstarted.html
test.headless: Run e2e tests in headless mode without GUI (compatible with default chrome capability)
test.specs: Glob pattern determines specs to run (relative to <projectRoot>)
